channel.title: Equinox
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img214.imageshack.us/img214/2355/equinoxbanner.jpg[/img][/center] To start, add my MSN if you are going to join: Jace.ronald@hotmail.com Hello, I am going to start a new community, it will be started from scratch, but I know how to build a good community! 1st of all, some bad news. I have some experience coding, but I can not host. Other than that, here are the needed Positions: [img]http://img178.imageshack.us/img178/9558/ownerz.png[/img]A hoster, that will be an owner. [img]http://img808.imageshack.us/img808/1230/modsilver.gif[/img]Head Ingame Moderator [img]http://img121.imageshack.us/img121/5673/modgold.gif[/img]Head Ingame Administrator [img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/1250/smod.gif[/img]A lot of Sectional Moderators [img]http://img547.imageshack.us/img547/888/modg.gif[/img]One or two Global Moderators There is still a lot we need to figure out, but before it all we need a source type. Probably Delta, but not sure yet. [u][b]Applications:[/b][/u] [b]For hoster, please follow this application:[/b]
Name: Age: Experience Coding: Experience Hosting: Can you host 24/7: Name some(5 maximum) traits about you: What is your MSN: Have you added my MSN:
[i][b]When the hoster is chosen, other staff will be chosen. I will subscribe to this post, and edit until our team is full. then we will start the server![/b][/i] _________________________ [b]Server Plans: [/b] I think this might start as a skilling server, and then have polls, changing(Adding spawn) and stuff like that. Also, we will have a good forums. More will be added when we get a hoster, and start.

@Jace_Ronald wrote:

item.title: Equinox
item.dc:creator: @use_are_client use are client
item.description:
@use_are_client wrote:

Name: Brandon Johnson
Age: 15
Experience Coding:I have coded my own server Deathly Hallows about 7 months back.
Experience Hosting: I had a old computer that was sitting around doing nothing, So i used to to host my server with which turned out to have more then 80 players on daily.
Can you host 24/7: Yes.
Name some(5 maximum) traits about you: I’m a very easy going person. I’m very easy to get along with. I love too meet new people. I’m homeschooled so can manage the server alot.
What is your MSN: Deathlyhallows1@Live.com
Have you added my MSN: Yes.

Read full topic

item.title: Equinox
item.dc:creator: @Jace_Ronald Jace Ronald
item.description:
@Jace_Ronald wrote:

[center][/center]

To start, add my MSN if you are going to join: Jace.ronald@hotmail.com

Hello, I am going to start a new community, it will be started from scratch, but I know how to build a good community! 1st of all, some bad news. I have some experience coding, but I can not host. Other than that, here are the needed Positions:

A hoster, that will be an owner.
Head Ingame Moderator
Head Ingame Administrator
A lot of Sectional Moderators
One or two Global Moderators

There is still a lot we need to figure out, but before it all we need a source type. Probably Delta, but not sure yet.

Applications:

For hoster, please follow this application:

Name: Age: Experience Coding: Experience Hosting: Can you host 24/7: Name some(5 maximum) traits about you: What is your MSN: Have you added my MSN:

When the hoster is chosen, other staff will be chosen. I will subscribe to this post, and edit until our team is full. then we will start the server!

Server Plans:

I think this might start as a skilling server, and then have polls, changing(Adding spawn) and stuff like that.
Also, we will have a good forums.

More will be added when we get a hoster, and start.

Read full topic
